original_text: When Paul had gathered a bundle of sticks and put them on the fire, a viper came out because of the heat and fastened on his hand.
korean_text: 바울이 나무 한 묶음을 거두어 불에 넣으니 뜨거움으로 말미암아 독사가 나와 그 손을 물고 있는지라

sentences.original_text: When Paul had gathered a bundle of sticks
sentences.korean_translation: 바울이 나뭇가지 한 묶음을 모았을 때

sentences.original_text: and put them on the fire
a viper came out because of the heat
